channel.title: [508] Magic and Range do not work?
channel.description:
I am using Davidscape 508, and I've gotten everything I wanted coded except for Magic and Range. My problem is, when I try to use either of them, they make my character run up to the enemy and not do anything. How can this be fixed?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [508] Magic and Range do not work?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Fixed in the newer versions.

Read full topic
